titleStmt.title: The old vvaye A sermon preached at Oxford, the eight day of Iuly, being the Act Sunday. 1610. By Robert Abbott ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1560-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Stansby] for Eleazar Edgar, and Ambrose Garbrand, and are to bee solde at their shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Wind-mill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
